title: Plastics in Cosmetics: Are we polluting the environment through our ...
body: This paper focuses on the emerging issue of plastic particles in personal care and cosmetic product (PCCP) formulations. Plastic ingredients in PCCPs are contributing to the abundance of plastic particles smaller than 5 mm in the ocean today.
